subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From the initial ''*k''-series of Old Chinese third-person pronouns, cognate with {{och-l|其|id=2}}. Also compare {{cog|mkh-pro|*ge(e)ʔ}}, whence {{cog|km|គេ||they; he; she}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

In standard Cantonese, the tone has assimilated with the other personal pronouns: {{zh-l|我|tr=ngo<sup>5</sup>}}, {{zh-l|你|tr=nei<sup>5</sup>}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
